entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a house-elf who appears in the crowd and helps Harry Potter.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character who is being held captive.

entities.name: dursleys
entities.description: The Dursleys are Harry's cruel and neglectful Muggle relatives.

entities.name: dudley dursley
entities.description: Dudley is the spoiled and arrogant son of Vernon and Petunia Dursley.

relationships.description: Dobby helps Harry Potter by calling out to him and telling the crowd that he is safe.
The Dursleys are holding Harry Potter captive in a cage.
